self.name: auth.exportLoginToken
self.description:
Generate a login token, for login via QR code.
The generated login token should be encoded using base64url, then shown as a tg://login?token=base64encodedtoken URL in the QR code.
self.descriptionExcerpt:
Generate a login token, for login via QR code.
The generated login token should be encoded...

arguments.name: exceptIds
arguments.description: List of already logged-in user IDs, to prevent logging in twice with the same user
